text: Chrissy Teigen nearly got hit by a cyclist in New York on Tuesday, but thankfully a kind stranger was looking out for her. READ MORE : Chrissy Teigen tells ‘ Ellen ’ she is expecting her second child in June The story came to light after a fan on Twitter noticed a curiously positioned man in the background of a paparazzi photo of the pregnant 32 - year - old model. Hey @ chrissyteigen this looks like you have strapped a very small man to your boob.
